titles.title: Anatomical Structures, Cell Types, plus Biomarkers (ASCT+B) table for Knee v1.1

descriptions.description: Anatomical Structures, Cell Types, plus Biomarkers (ASCT+B) tables aim to capture the nested part_of structure of anatomical human body parts, the typology of cells, and biomarkers used to identify cell types. The tables are authored and reviewed by an international team of experts.

alternateIdentifier.alternateIdentifierType: How to Cite This Data Table
